May 17, 2016Marat I. Latypov

New look of the blog

I am excited to introduce the new design of the blog – with more focus on the content – for a better reading experience. Enjoy!

If, for some reason, you really miss the old design, it will be still available for a while at latmarat.net/old-blog/ (though it is no longer updated).

The link structure has changed so that some links (especially in google search) may have become broken. Check the index to find the post you are looking for!

Stress-strain data from ABAQUS simulations using Python

The post describes a Python script for obtaining stress--strain data from ABAQUS simulations with representative volume elements of heterogeneous microstructures.

ABAQUS volumetric mesh from Dream.3D surface mesh

The post describes a MATLAB script for obtaining ABAQUS tetrahedral volume mesh from surface mesh of grain boundaries generated in Dream.3D.

ABAQUS hexahedral mesh and grain orientations from Dream.3D
